title: BOOK BOLT Amazon Research Tools Step-by-Step Training Tutorial

tactics.name: Amazon Keyword Research
tactics.description: Use Book Bolt's real-time Amazon search to find top-selling books in specific categories.
steps: Enter keywords and select a category
caveats: Data may not reflect real-time Amazon rankings
source_quotes: this tool will help you look at the top 100 books based on something related to what you're thinking about creating

tactics.name: Seller Tab Analysis
tactics.description: Research brand names and book stats for marketing analysis by searching Amazon bestsellers and reviewing seller performance.
steps: Identify brand/author names from top sellers
Paste brand names into Book Bolt's Seller tab
Review current bestsellers and statistics for the brand
caveats: May not show all books from a brand, only trending bestsellers
source_quotes: 'take notice of the brand name... paste into book bolt'

tactics.name: Cloud Tab Research
tactics.description: Filter top-selling books by category, price range, and keywords to analyze pricing trends and sales rank history.
steps: Review BSR price history and sales trends
source_quotes: 'see estimated sales for the month and history for the past 30 days'

tactics.name: Keyword Research with ASIN Lookup
tactics.description: Extract keywords from bestselling books by searching for ASINs and analyzing keyword data.
steps: Search for top 100 bestsellers using keywords like 'planes train and Automobiles'
Copy ASIN numbers from bestselling books
Paste ASINs into KDP categories tab for keyword analysis
Review search volume, competition, and related keywords
caveats: Requires manual filtering of irrelevant terms
source_quotes: '16,184 people search using this particular keyword phrase within a month'

tactics.name: Category Optimization
tactics.description: Use Book Bolt's KDP Categories Tool to identify high-traffic, low-competition categories for your book
steps: Enter a broad niche keyword in the search box
Review suggested categories and their performance metrics
Select categories that are popular but not overly competitive
caveats: May not account for seasonal trends
source_quotes: this book is number one in this first flowers and Landscaping coloring books for grown-ups

heuristics.name: Review Count Filter
heuristics.condition: If a book has fewer than 200 reviews, prioritize it for niche targeting
source_quotes: when you create your book that you want to get ideas but then make your book cover even better

heuristics.name: Review Count Threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize books with higher BSR rankings

heuristics.name: High-Volume Keyword Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If keyword search volume exceeds 10,000 monthly searches, prioritize for optimization
source_quotes: '8,000 searches per month for people looking for 101 dog tricks'

heuristics.name: Review-Driven Visibility
heuristics.condition: If a book has fewer than 200 reviews, prioritize boosting its visibility
source_quotes: it has 608 reviews let's click on this book

claims.statement: Book Bolt provides real-time Amazon keyword research and book creation tools for KDP authors
source_quotes: book bolt has all the tools you need to help you succeed

claims.statement: Book Bolt's Cloud tab provides daily updated sales rank history for the past 30 days.
KDP categories tab provides keyword suggestions based on Amazon search trends
source_quotes: 'Keywords tab provides keyword suggestions to help your book get found'

claims.statement: KDP Spy provides detailed analytics on book performance including estimated sales and revenue
source_quotes: it also shows the average rating the number of ratings estimated sales estimated Revenue

niche_patterns.example: food log + dietary restrictions + low review count
niche_patterns.description: Target underserved niches with specific constraints using low-review keywords
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Identifies gaps in existing market offerings
source_quotes: you want to remember that when you create your book that you want to get ideas but then make your book cover even better

niche_patterns.description: Target specific age groups with activity-based content for higher engagement
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Aligns with Amazon's category filtering and parental search behavior
